data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
Corner awarded to Orlando.
Throw-in for Columbus in their own half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Orlando at Exploria Stadium.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Columbus in their own half.
Orlando have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
In the minute 8, Can Orlando capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Columbus's half?
Columbus needs to be cautious. Orlando have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Columbus.
In the minute 10, Tesho Akindele gets his shot on target but fails to score for Orlando.
Throw-in for Orlando in the half of Columbus.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Columbus in their own half.
In the minute 12, Ramy Touchan signals a throw-in for Columbus, close to Orlando's area.
Can Columbus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orlando's half?
Columbus attack but Gyasi Zardes's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 13, Ramy Touchan awards Orlando a goal kick.
Orlando's Junior Urso misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Columbus goal kick.
In the minute 16, It's a goal kick for the home team in Orlando.
Free kick Columbus.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Columbus.
In the minute 17, Play has been interrupted briefly in Orlando to check on Ruan, who is grimacing with pain.
Orlando's Nani gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Columbus defender.
Orlando have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
In the minute 20, Corner awarded to Orlando.
Orlando's Ruan looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Orlando's Tesho Akindele gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 22, Columbus have a goal kick.
In Orlando Orlando attack through Nani. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Columbus at Exploria Stadium.
In the minute 25, Junior Urso (Orlando) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Orlando have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
Ball goes out of play for a Columbus goal kick.
In the minute 27, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Chris Mueller.
That's a fine assist from Mauricio Pereyra.
In Orlando, Orlando push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 30, Ramy Touchan signals a Orlando throw-in in Columbus's half.
Chris Mueller of Orlando gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Columbus at Exploria Stadium.
In the minute 32, Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
Columbus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ramy Touchan awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 35, In Orlando a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Nani.
Nani for Orlando is back on the field again.
In the minute 40, In Orlando, Lucas Zelarrayan of Columbus is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Ball safe as Orlando is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ramy Touchan awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 43, Orlando have a dangerous throw-in.
Important block from the Columbus defence as Nani fires in a strike for Orlando.
Corner awarded to Orlando.
In the minute 45, Columbus have a goal kick.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Columbus to take a throw-in in Orlando territory.
Free kick for Columbus in their own half.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
In the minute 45, Can Columbus capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
The first-half is over at Exploria Stadium.
The second-half is underway at Exploria Stadium.
In the minute 46, Throw-in high up the field for Columbus in Orlando.
Orlando push forward at Exploria Stadium and Mauricio Pereyra gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Columbus defence.
Columbus awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, Ramy Touchan awards Orlando a goal kick.
Free kick for Columbus in the half of Orlando.
At Exploria Stadium, Nani is shown a red card and sent off.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Columbus close to the penalty box.
Robin Jansson (Orlando) has received a first yellow card.
Harrison Afful is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
In the minute 56, Pedro Santos with an assist there.
Throw-in high up the field for Orlando in Orlando.
Derrick Etienne is replacing Luis Diaz for the away team.
In the minute 59, Oscar Pareja is making the team's first substitution at Exploria Stadium with Jhegson Mendez replacing Chris Mueller.
Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
Corner awarded to Columbus.
In the minute 64, Orlando to take a throw-in in Columbus territory.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Columbus.
Orlando's Mauricio Pereyra has been booked in Orlando.
In the minute 66, Columbus will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Orlando.
Orlando have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Orlando.
In the minute 69, Caleb Porter (Columbus) is making a second substitution, with Aidan Morris replacing Darlington Nagbe.
The away team replace Lucas Zelarrayan with Youness Mokhtar.
Benji Michel is on a sub for Tesho Akindele for Orlando.
In the minute 71, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Orlando close to the penalty box.
Columbus awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 76, Orlando awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
The away team have replaced Gyasi Zardes with Krisztian Nemeth. This is the fourth substitution made today by Caleb Porter.
Throw-in for Orlando in their own half.
Ball safe as Columbus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 80, Throw-in Orlando.
Can Orlando get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Columbus's half?
Free kick Orlando.
In the minute 81, At Exploria Stadium, Pedro Santos has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Columbus in their own half.
Orlando take a 2-1 lead thanks to Benji Michel.
In the minute 84, Mauricio Pereyra instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Orlando at Exploria Stadium.
Ramy Touchan signals a Columbus throw-in in Orlando's half.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Columbus in the half of Orlando.
Columbus are in shooting range from this free kick.
Ramy Touchan waits before resuming play because Mauricio Pereyra for Orlando is still down.
In the minute 88, Mauricio Pereyra, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Joey Dezart is the substitute for Orlando.
Orlando make their fourth substitution with Rodrigo Schlegel replacing Junior Urso.
Throw-in Orlando.
At Exploria Stadium the fourth official shows that 8 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Ramy Touchan awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Orlando goal kick.
Orlando have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Orlando at Exploria Stadium.
Throw-in for Columbus in their own half.
Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 2-1.
Pedro Gallese (Orlando) gets a yellow card.
